summary:
38 years as Exploration Geologist for Shell.
Exploration evaluation experience in a/o Egypt, NW Borneo, MENA, China, North Sea, Oman, Geology Research and Teaching.
Strong  evaluation skills in Exploration, Opportunity Screening and Appraisal disciplines. 
Key technical skills in Seismic Stratigraphy and Reservoir Characterization. Extensive supervisory, teaching and coaching experience. 
Strong interest in Geoscience and Petroleum Geology Learning.
Retired October 2014.
At present Independent Geological Consultant and Trainer.
